entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
